div.div: 3D spectrogram of a typical recording of 3 species (trainfile115 in NIPS20134B database) demonstrating the difficulties in recognition due to different gains in target signals and noise.
div.p: From 14–19 kHz a Cicada, 8–13 kHz Bush Cricket, 2.5–3.8 Eurasian Blackcap, 0–2 kHz strong airplane noise.
